enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Causes damage to enemies when they attack you.
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Causes the tool to lose durability at a slower rate.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Has infinite uses, or infinite ammo.
enchantment.cartographer.hazard_protecti: Reduces damage taken from fire, explosion and magic.
enchantment.cartographer.melee_protectio: Reduces damage taken from melee damage.
enchantment.cartographer.ranged_protecti: Reduces damage taken from ranged damage.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces damage taken from projectiles such as arrows and fire balls.
enchantment.cartographer.windborn.desc: Gain extra airdash. Airdash is used after midair jumps.
enchantment.cartographer.bracing.desc: On kill, gain a one-hit shield.
enchantment.cartographer.decontaminate.d: When inflicted with negative status effects, gain a chance to remove them.
enchantment.cartographer.evasion.desc: Has a chance to completely dodge attacks.
enchantment.cartographer.hastiness.desc: On kill, gain attack speed and mining efficiency temporarily.
enchantment.cartographer.lifeblood.desc: On kill, gain absorption hearts temporarily.
enchantment.cartographer.mightiness.desc: On kill, gain attack damage temporarily.
enchantment.cartographer.nullifying.desc: Gain one-hit shield that recharges slowly.
enchantment.cartographer.shielding.desc: Gain absorption hearts that recharge slowly when out of combat.
enchantment.cartographer.stealthiness.de: On kill, reduces enemy detection range temporarily.
enchantment.cartographer.swiftness.desc: On kill, gain movement speed temporarily.
enchantment.cartographer.adrenaline.desc: When attacked, gain movement speed temporarily.
enchantment.cartographer.bulwark.desc: When attacked, reduces incoming damage for a short duration.
enchantment.cartographer.courageous.desc: Reduces damage taken based on how many enemies are targeting you.
enchantment.cartographer.diversion.desc: When attacked, has a chance to spawn a decoy that aggros enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.frenzy.desc: When attacked, gain attack damage temporarily.
enchantment.cartographer.hardened.desc: Reduces damage taken if its the same type as the last hit.
enchantment.cartographer.inertia.desc: Increase charge based on your activity. Reduces damage taken based on charge.
enchantment.cartographer.poise.desc: Reduces damage taken when health is above 50%%.
enchantment.cartographer.sidestep.desc: Reduce damage taken from first hit. Has a cooldown.
enchantment.cartographer.steadfast.desc: Reduces damage taken when health is below 50%%.
enchantment.cartographer.tenacity.desc: Reduces damage taken when healing for a duration.
enchantment.cartographer.unseen.desc: Reduces damage taken based on how little enemies are targeting you.
enchantment.cartographer.aberration.desc: On kill, create explosive slime minion.
enchantment.cartographer.deadeye.desc: While sprinting, automatically fire projectiles at nearby enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.eruption.desc: On first hit, detonate dealing extra damage.
enchantment.cartographer.gravity.desc: Falling attacks deal extra damage and knockback.
enchantment.cartographer.induction.desc: Move and attack to gain charge. Consume full charge to unleash chain lightning.
enchantment.cartographer.momentum.desc: Move and attack to gain charge. Deal extra damage and knockback based on charge.
enchantment.cartographer.orbit.desc: Randomly create orbiting projectiles that colide with enemies when dealing damage.
enchantment.cartographer.quake.desc: On kill, create an earthquake that damages nearby enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.soulfire.desc: On first hit, spawns a wisp that damages nearby enemies after a short delay.
enchantment.cartographer.starfall.desc: Randomly create meteors that land on enemies and deal damage when dealing damage.
enchantment.cartographer.storm.desc: Move and attack to gain charge. Attack to create a storm that changes the enemies hit.
enchantment.cartographer.surge.desc: When sprinting and coming to a halt, create a shockwave that damages nearby enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.trailblazer.des: Sprinting creates a fire trail that damage enemies within.
enchantment.cartographer.vengeance.desc: When attacked, your next attack within a short duration deals extra damage.
Over time, restore durability to the item.
enchantment.cartographer.soulbound.desc: Item stays with you even after death.
enchantment.cartographer.spurs.desc: Automatically removes nearby cobwebs and hazardous plants.
enchantment.cartographer.drilling.desc: Has a chance to instantly mine a block. Can only trigger once on a block.
enchantment.cartographer.excavator.desc: Mining ore, spawner, cobweb will break identical neighboring blocks.
enchantment.cartographer.lightborn.desc: Punching a block while sneaking will place a torch from your inventory.
enchantment.cartographer.multitool.desc: Can mine other mining type blocks at reduced efficiency.
enchantment.cartographer.chaotic.desc: Increases the damage of the item randomly.
enchantment.cartographer.duelist.desc: Increases damage against Humanoid mobs, such as Zombies, Illagers and Piglins.
enchantment.cartographer.focus.desc: Attacks gain Focus Stack. Increases damage based on Focus Stacks.
enchantment.cartographer.hex_eater.desc: Increases damage against targets that have 2+ negative status effects.
enchantment.cartographer.hunter.desc: Increases damage against Monstrous mobs, such as Spiders, Phantoms, and Endermen.
enchantment.cartographer.overcharge.desc: Increases damage if you hold the attack for an extra second.
enchantment.cartographer.point_blank.des: Increases damage if the target is within 8 blocks.
enchantment.cartographer.sharpshot.desc: Increases damage if the target is beyond 12 blocks.
enchantment.cartographer.explosive.desc: Create a small explosion that damages enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.pulling.desc: On hit, pull the target towards you.
enchantment.cartographer.repulsion.desc: Right clicking creates a blast that deals damage.
enchantment.cartographer.ambushing.desc: Right clicking teleports you to the target.
enchantment.cartographer.lunging.desc: Right clicking performs a lunge, damaging enemies in the path and invincible while airborne.
enchantment.cartographer.quick_strike.de: Attacking removes attack cooldown for a short duration with a moderate cooldown.
enchantment.cartographer.riposte.desc: Right clicking blocks incoming damage partially and counterattacks the enemy.
enchantment.cartographer.slamming.desc: Critical hits create a shockwave that damages nearby enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.throwable.desc: Right clicking throws a copy of the weapon.
enchantment.cartographer.thrusting.desc: Sprint attacking performs a thrust attack that pierces through enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.barbed.desc: On hit, applies a splinter that damages if the target moves.
enchantment.cartographer.barrage.desc: Creates replica projectiles that shoot right after your main projectile.
enchantment.cartographer.collapse.desc: Projectiles attempts to destroy the block that it lands on as if it was a iron pickaxe.
enchantment.cartographer.correction.desc: Passing near an enemy will slightly adjust the projectile's trajectory towards them.
enchantment.cartographer.fleetfoot.desc: Right clicking performs a dash in the direction they're moving.
enchantment.cartographer.grappling.desc: Projectiles pull you towards where it lands.
enchantment.cartographer.ricochet.desc: Projectiles bounce off surfaces a limited number of times.
enchantment.cartographer.ripper.desc: On hit, applies a splinter that increases melee damage taken.
enchantment.cartographer.shrapnel.desc: On hit, creates shrapnel that damages nearby enemies.
enchantment.cartographer.infinity.desc: Has infinite uses, or infinite ammo.
enchantment.cartographer.repeating.desc: Has multiple charges before needing to be recharged.
enchantment.cartographer.repeating_cross: Has multiple arrows before needing to be reloaded.
enchantment.cartographer.repeating_consu: Has multiple charges before needing to be recharged.
enchantment.cartographer.annulling_curse: When inflicted with positive status effects, gain a chance to remove them.
enchantment.cartographer.clumsiness_curs: Falling damage is increased, as well as crouching does not prevent you from falling off edges.
enchantment.cartographer.corruption_curs: Locks item if user is inflicted with a status effect.
enchantment.cartographer.crippling_curse: Locks item temporarily if user takes direct damage.
enchantment.cartographer.crumbling_curse: Over time, loses durability to the item.
Consumes hunger and saturation when item is used.
On death, becomes a mob that attacks players.
enchantment.cartographer.instability_cur: Incoming damage type is cycled on every hit.
enchantment.cartographer.irreparability_: Prevents item from being used in anvils.
enchantment.cartographer.jamming_curse.d: Crossbow cannot be reloaded by normal means.
enchantment.cartographer.locked_curse.de: Item's enchantments does not take effect. On level 2, it disables the item stats as well.
enchantment.cartographer.melee_fragility: Take extra damage from melee attacks.
enchantment.cartographer.pride_curse.des: Locks item if user is using more than 1 item with the curse.
enchantment.cartographer.projectile_frag: Take extra damage from projectile attacks.
enchantment.cartographer.regret_curse.de: Deals damage to user when the item is used.
enchantment.cartographer.shattering_curs: On death, the item loses durability.
enchantment.cartographer.two_handed_curs: Locks item if user has item on its other hand.
